item.title: Clixpy.com Click Path Tracking
item.description: Clixpy is a service that tracks everything your siteâ€™s users do, from mouse movement, clicks, and scrolling, to form inputs. The user sessions are as video for you to analyze. Installation requires pasting a few lines of JavaScript into your pages. Check out their excellent demo to see how it works. http://clixpy.com/
